info.name: Role Filter
info.description: Filter the user list by selected roles.

changelog.title: New Feature: Add Any Role
items: Filter on any role by clicking the plus button at the top of the member's list
Use the search bar to search for a specific role

changelog.title: Less spam on big servers
items: When you filter in a large channel, the warning message will pop up only once, rather than every time you click on a role
The warning message shows again once you change server/channel
